movie.title: Anthropoid
movie.plot: In December 1941, Czech soldier Jozef Gabčík and Jan Kubiš parachute into their occupied homeland to assassinate Nazi officer Reinhard Heydrich

events.title: Reinhard Heydrich is assassinated by soldiers involved in Operation Anthropoid
